item.title: Judge orders immediate release of Kilmar Abrego Garcia from immigration detention
item.description: A federal judge has ordered the immediate release of Kilmar Abrego Garcia from immigration detention.

item.title: Evacuations ordered amid threat of 'catastrophic' flooding in Washington state
item.description: Officials in Washington have issued an evacuation order as an atmospheric river event has been slamming the Pacific Northwest.

item.title: WATCH: Skydivers narrowly averting disaster
item.description: A stunning video shows skydivers narrowly averting a disaster after a parachute deployed too early.

item.title: Time magazine names 'Architects of AI' as its person of the year for 2025
item.description: The “Architects of AI” were named Time magazine’s person of the year for 2025

item.title: WATCH: At 100, war veteran still volunteers to tell history
item.description: Danny New speaks to Arthur Grabiner, a WW II veteran who continues to educate people about his experience during the war in the Pacific.
